short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you provide and manage access to different apps and services for Raccoon Chat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raccoon Tail is a chrome extension built by Raccoon AI to help you provide and manage access to different apps and services for Raccoon Chat.

All you have to do is get this extension, navigate to tail.flyingraccoon.tech, enter your passcode and start linking different apps and services to the Raccoon's tail and start using them through Raccoon Chat, allowing it to take actions on these apps and services on your behalf. 

Raccoon Tail is a robust platform and is built with a security first mindset:
- It doesn't store your credentials. It securely uses session state to manage access.
- You can remove access to apps and services anytime directly from your settings page.
